Title: Relates to establishing an office of antibiotic resistance control and to establishing the antibiotics education fund
Summary: Relates to establishing an office of antibiotic-resistance control; establishes the antibiotics education fund; includes methicillin-resistant staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) and other antibiotic-resistant infections in the definition of airborne infectious disease.
LawCode: Add Art 2 Title 9 §§269-a - 269-n, Pub Health L; add §97-aaaa, St Fin L; amd §218-b, Lab L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to establishing an office of antibiotic-resistance control; to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the antibiotics education fund; and to amend the labor law, in relation to including methicillin-resistant staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) and other antibiotic-resistant infections in the definition of airborne infectious disease
